nodes.name: Read CSV
nodes.description: It reads in CSV files and creates a DataFrame from it.
nodes.hint: Infer the schema when a new file is selected or the file content has changed

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: path
fields.title: Path
fields.description: Path of the file/directory

fields.description: CSV Separator

fields.name: header
fields.title: Header
fields.description: Whether the file has a header row

fields.name: dropSpecialCharacterInColumnName
fields.title: Drop Special Character In ColumnName
fields.description: Whether to drop the Special Characters and Spaces in Column Name.

fields.name: mode
fields.title: Mode
fields.description: Mode for dealing with corrupt records during parsing.

fields.name: enforceSchema
fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. If the option is set to false, the schema will be validated against all headers in CSV files in the case when the header option is set to true.

fields.title: Escape
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quotes inside an already quoted value.

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    COUNT(distinct fdr_meter_number) as _Count,
    FDR_Event_Date,
    Day_Bucket_Id
from 
    fire_temp_table
GROUP BY
    FDR_Event_Date,
    Day_Bucket_Id
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    *
FROM 
    fire_temp_table
WHERE 
    _Count = 1
order BY 
    FDR_Event_Date,
    Day_Bucket_Id
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    *
FROM tempTable1 aa inner join tempTable2 bb
on aa.DTR_Event_Date = bb.FDR_Event_Date
where 
    DTR_Event_Start_Time >= FDR_Event_Start_Time_1MINUS and
    DTR_Event_Start_Time <= FDR_Event_Start_Time_1PLUS and
    DTR_Event_End_Time >= FDR_Event_End_Time_1MINUS AND
    DTR_Event_End_Time <= FDR_Event_End_Time_1PLUS
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Column Names for the CSV
fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Column Types for the CSV
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Column Formats for the CSV
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    dtr_meter_number,
    fdr_meter_number,
    COUNT(*) as No_Match
FROM fire_temp_table
GROUP BY
    dtr_meter_number,
    fdr_meter_number
ORDER BY
    dtr_meter_number,
    fdr_meter_number
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    *,
    DTR_Event_Hr*1 +  0*DTR_Event_Start_Time_minute div 30 as Day_Bucket_Id
from 
    fire_temp_table
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes

fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    fdr_meter_number,
    dtr_meter_number,
    COUNT(*) as No_DTR
FROM fire_temp_table
GROUP BY
    fdr_meter_number,
    dtr_meter_number
ORDER BY
    fdr_meter_number,
    dtr_meter_number
fields.title: SQL

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    dtr_meter_number,
    fdr_meter_number,
    No_Match,
    No_FDR,
    No_DTR,
    100*(No_Match/No_FDR) as PCT_Matched_FDR,
    100*(No_Match/No_DTR) as PCT_Matched_DTR
FROM fire_temp_table
ORDER BY
    dtr_meter_number
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    aa.*,
    dtr_meter_number
FROM tempTable1 aa inner join tempTable2 bb
on aa.fdr_meter_number = bb.fdr_meter_number AND
aa.FDR_Event_Date >= bb.DTR_Event_Start_Date AND
aa.FDR_Event_Date <= bb.DTR_Event_End_Date
fields.title: SQL

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
select aa.*
from tempTable1 aa join tempTable2 bb ON
aa.Day_Bucket_Id = bb.Day_Bucket_Id AND
aa.DTR_Event_Date = bb.FDR_Event_Date

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    *,
    FDR_Event_Hr*1 + 0*FDR_Event_Start_Time_minute div 30 as Day_Bucket_Id
from 
    fire_temp_table
